Yog puab tsiv lug rua huv nroog, peb cov tuabneeg yuav nqaa hlua moog khi lub nroog  ntawd tug ntsaa yeej caab kuas qaug taag moog rua nraag kwj haa. Tsi pub kuas tshuav ib lub nyuas pobzeb seem nyob sau ncov roob le.’ ”

Axaloos hab cov Yixalayees has tas, “Husais zaaj tswvyim zoo dlua Ahithaufees zaaj tswvyim!” Tug TSWV ua rua Ahithaufees tej tswvyim kws zoo tsi muaj kuab lawm, txhaj tsi muaj leejtwg ua lawv le ntawd, yog le ntawd, tej kev puamtsuaj txhaj lug raug Axaloos.
Husais txawm moog pav tej lug kws nwg tau has rua Axaloos hab cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj noog, hab coj Ahithaufees tej lug moog pav huv tuabsi rua Xadaus hab Anpiyathas kws yog ob tug povthawj noog.

Husais has ntxiv tas, “Taamsim nuav ca le tso tuabneeg moog has rua Daviv paub, kuas nwg tsi xob pw nraag tug dlej kws hlaa moog rua tom taj suabpuam, tabsis kuas nwg ca le hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog kuas dlhau plawg rua saab tim u, nwg hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhaj tsi raug nteg hab tsi raug tua.”

Anpiyathas tug tub Yaunathaas hab Xadaus tug tub Ahima-as nyob rawv ntawm lub qhovdlej txhawv Elaunkees kws nyob saab nrau ntug nroog Yeluxalees tog, rua qhov ntshai nyob tsaam muaj tuabneeg pum obtug moog huv lub nroog. Muaj ib tug ntxhais qhev naj zag coj tej xuv tuaj qha rua obtug. Obtug maam le moog qha rua Vaajntxwv Daviv paub.

Tabsis muaj ib nub ib tug mivnyuas tub pum obtug, nwg txawm lug qha rua Axaloos; yog le ntawd obtug txhaj maaj nrooj tsiv moog nkaum rua huv ib tug txivneej lub tsev huv Npahulees. Tug txivneej ntawd muaj ib lub qhov tshij nyob ze nwg lub tsev, ces obtug txhaj nqeg moog nkaum huv lub qhov tshij ntawd.
Tug txivneej ntawd tug quaspuj muab ib dlaim ntaub lug nthuav npug thoob plawg lub qhov tshij hab muab nplej w thoob plawg rua sau, kuas tsi muaj leejtwg paub has tas, muaj tuabneeg nyob huv.

Axaloos cov numtswv tuaj rua huv tsev hab nug tug quaspuj ntawd has tas, “Ahima-as hab Yaunathaas obtug nyob qhov twg?” Tug quaspuj ntawd teb has tas, “Obtug hlaa dlej moog rua saab tim u lawm.” Cov txivneej ntawd nrhav obtug, tabsis tsi pum obtug le, puab txhaj rov qaab moog rua tom lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm.

Tom qaab kws puab moog dlhau lawm, Ahima-as hab Yaunathaas obtug tawm huv qhov tshij lug hab moog qha rua Vaajntxwv Daviv paub. Obtug moog qha rua Daviv paub txug tej kws Ahithaufees tau nrhav tswvyim tawmtsaam Daviv hab has tas, “Mej ca le hlaa dlej moog saab tim u.”
Yog le ntawd, Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhaj hlaa tug dlej Yauladees thaus kaaj ntug txoog, puab tub hlaa dlhau dlej taag rua saab tim u lawm.

Thaus Ahithaufees paub has tas, tsi muaj tuabneeg pum zoo ua lawv le nwg has, nwg txhaj le muab eeb pem rua sau nwg tug neeg luav hab caij tsiv rov moog rua tim nwg lub qub zog lawm. Tom qaab kws nwg tu nwg tej khoom tav taag, nwg txawm moog dlai tuag. Luas coj nwg moog log rua huv nwg tsev tuabneeg lub qhov ntxaa.
Thaus Axaloos hab cov Yixalayees hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees tuaj, Daviv tub moog txug rua huv lub nroog Mahana-ees lawm.

(Axaloos tsaa Amaxas ua tug thawj tubrog hloov Yau-am chaw. Amaxas yog Yetheles kws yog cov tuabneeg Yisamayees  tug tub; nwg nam hu ua Anpinkayis kws yog Nahases tug ntxhais, hab yog Xeluyas kws yog Yau-am nam tug nam hluas.)
Axaloos hab nwg cov tuabneeg tuaj tsuam yeej rua huv lub xeev Nkile-as.

Thaus Daviv moog txug huv lub nroog Mahana-ees, nwg txawm ntsib Nahases tug tub Saunas kws nyob tim lub nroog Lanpas huv tebchaws Amoos, hab ntsib Amiyees tug tub Makhis kws nyob huv lub nroog Laudenpas, hab Npaxilais kws nyob huv lub nroog Launkelees huv xeev Nkile-as.

Puab peb leeg nuav nqaa taig, laujkaub aav, choj pua chaw, nplej, ntsab, moov pobkws, mov kib, taum laag, taum mog,  zib ntaab, roj mig nyuj qhuav, kua mig nyuj hab ob peb tug yaaj tuaj pub rua Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg tau siv hab tau noj. Rua qhov puab paub has tas Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg tub tshaib plaab hab tsaug heev tom roob mojsaab qhua lawm.
Vaajntxwv Daviv sau zog nwg cov tuabneeg lug ua ke, muab faib ua tej paab ib txheeb leej, tej paab ib puas leej hab tsaa cov thawj lug saib puab.

Daviv txhaj xaa puab tawm moog ua peb paab, nrug Yau-am hab nwg tug kwv Anpisais hab Ithais kws tuaj huv lub nroog Nkas tuaj. Puab ib leeg coj ib paab. Hab vaajntxwv has rua nwg cov tuabneeg tas, “Kuv yuav nrug mej moog.”

Tabsis puab teb has tas, “Koj tsi xob moog, txawm yog peb cov seem thim tsiv ntawm cov yeebncuab rov lug lossis peb raug tua tuag ib nraab lawm los yeej tsi tseemceeb dlaabtsi, rua qhov koj yog tug tseemceeb tshaaj peb kaum txeeb leej. Yog le ntawd, koj nyob huv nroog nuav txhij tuabneeg tuaj paab peb zoo dlua.”

Vaajntxwv teb has tas, “Kuv yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le mej xaav kuas kuv ua.” Ces nwg txawm moog sawv ntawm roojvaag saib nwg cov tuabneeg tawm moog ua tej paab ib txheeb leej, hab tej paab ib puas leej.
Daviv has rua Yau-am, Anpisais hab Ithais has tas, “Yog mej hlub kuv, thov mej tsi xob ua phem rua tug tub hluas Axaloos!” Cov tubrog puavleej nov Daviv has le ntawd rua nwg cov thawj tubrog.
Daviv cov tubrog tawm moog rua tom roob mojsaab hab tua cov Yixalayees huv thaaj Haav Zoov kws yog cov Efalayees cheebtsaam aav.
Cov Yixalayees swb Daviv cov tubrog; yog ib qhov poob tsaam txaus ntshai kawg le, nub ntawd xwb muaj neeg nkaum txheeb leej raug tua tuag.
Puab sis tua tawg ri sua moog thoob plawg rua peg tej roob mojsaab, hab cov tuabneeg kws tuag rua huv haav zoov tseem coob tshaaj cov kws raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog.

Ces thaus ntawd Axaloos txawm ntsib Daviv cov tuabneeg. Axaloos caij ib tug neeg zaag, tug neeg zaag dlha moog nkaag rua huv ib tsob qaab ntoo qheb, Axaloos lub cejdlaab txhaj dlaig nkaus rua sau nkhib ntoo. Tug neeg luav dlha dlhau plawg lawm ca Axaloos dlai ncuv rua sau.
Daviv cov tuabneeg ib tug lug pum Axaloos, nwg txhaj moog qha rua Yau-am has tas, “Kuv pum Axaloos khuam dlai ncuv rua sau tug nkhib ntoo qheb.”
Yau-am teb has tas, “Yog koj pum nwg tag, ua caag koj tsi muab nwg tua kag? Kuv yuav muab kaum dlaim nyaj hab ib txuj hlaab rua koj.”

Tabsis tug txivneej ntawd teb has tas, “Txawm yog koj yuav muab ib txheeb dlaim nyaj rua kuv los kuv yuav tsi muab kuv tug ntivteg moog tawmtsaam vaajntxwv tug tub lub cev le. Peb suavdlawg puavleej nov vaajntxwv tej lug kws nwg has rua koj, has rua Anpisais hab Ithais has tas, ‘Yog mej hlub kuv, thov tsi xob ua phem rua tug tub hluas Axaloos.’
Yog has tas kuv tsi noog vaajntxwv lug, kuv muab Axaloos tua lawm, vaajntxwv yeej yuav paub xwb, rua qhov thaus nwg nov, koj yuav tsi paab kuv dlaws zaaj nuav.”

Yau-am teb has tas, “Kuv tsi xaav nkim sijhawm nrug koj has ntxiv lawm.” Yau-am txhaj rhu hlo nwg peb raab muv nkaug kag Axaloos hauvsab thaus kws Axaloos tseem tsi tau tuag, hab khuam ncuv rua sau tug nkhib ntoo qheb.
Ces Yau-am cov tubrog kaum leej txhaj hlaa hlo moog rua ntawm Axaloos hab muab nwg loos tuag kag lawm.
Yau-am tshuab raaj tshuab xyu kuas tseg tsi xob sis tua, cov tubrog txhaj thim rov qaab lug tsi caum cov Yixalayees ntxiv lawm.

Puab muab Axaloos lub cev txu lug hab kwv moog pov rua huv ib lub qhov tub tub huv haav zoov, hab muab pobzeb txhub lub qhov ntawd ua ib pawg ca. Taagnrho cov Yixalayees, nyag txhaj tsiv nyag rov moog tsev taag lawm.

Thaus kws Axaloos tseem ua neej nyob, nwg puab tau ib tug pemthuam rua huv lub Haav Vaajntxwv, ca ua chaw ncu txug nwg, rua qhov nwg tsi muaj tub lug ris nwg lub npe. Yog le ntawd, txhaj muab tug pemthuam ntawd hu lawv le nwg lub npe hab naj nub nua tseem paub has tas yog Axaloos tug pemthuam.
Ces Xadaus tug tub Ahima-as txhaj thov Yau-am has tas, “Ca kuv coj tej xuv nuav moog qha rua vaajntxwv paub has tas, tug TSWV tub cawm nwg dlim ntawm nwg cov yeebncuab lawm.”
Yau-am teb has tas, “Tsi xob moog; nub nua koj tsi xob coj ib yaam xuv dlaabtsi moog qha rua vaajntxwv paub le. Lwm nub tsaiv koj maam le moog, rua qhov nub nua yog nub kws vaajntxwv tug tub tuag.”
Yau-am has rua nwg tug tubqhe kws yog tuabneeg Sudaas has tas, “Koj ca le moog qha tej kws koj pum ntawd rua vaajntxwv paub.” Tug tubqhe txhaj le nyo ntshis hawm hab moog lawm.

Ahima-as pheej thov has tas, “Txawm yog le caag los xij, thov ca kuv coj tej xuv nuav moog qha rua vaajntxwv hab.” Yau-am nug has tas, “Mivtub, vim le caag koj xaav moog? Koj yeej yuav tsi tau nqe zug dlaabtsi le los sav!”

Ahima-as rov has dlua tas, “Txawm yog le caag los xij, kuv xaav moog xwb.” Yau-am teb has tas, “Koj ca le moog.” Yog le ntawd, Ahima-as txhaj dlha taug txujkev kws moog rua nraag lub Haav Yauladees, hab moog txeeb kag tug tubqhe ntawd ntej lawm.

Daviv taabtom nyob ntawm lub roojvaag nroog saab huv hab saab nrau kis nruab nraab. Tug tub faajxwm nce moog rua sau tug ntsaa yeej hab sawv sau roojvaag; saib moog rua tim ncauj ke, nwg pum ib tug txivneej dlha taug kev lug.
Nwg hu qha rua vaajntxwv, vaajntxwv teb has tas, “Yog nwg tuab leeg lug xwb, ces yog nwg coj xuv zoo lug ntaag!” Tug txivneej ntawd dlha lug ze zuj zug.

Tug tub faajxwm rov pum dlua ib tug dlha lug hab, nwg txhaj hu rua tug tu lub roojvaag has tas, “Saib tid saib, muaj dlua ib tug txivneej dlha lug hab.” Vaajntxwv teb has tas, “Tug ntawd los yog coj xuv zoo lug hab.”
Tug faajxwm has tas, “Kuv saib mas tug txivneej kws dlha ua ntej zoo le yog Ahima-as ntaag.” Vaajntxwv has tas, “Nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg zoo, nwg txhaj coj xuv zoo lug.”
Ahima-as lug txhus caug ndlua rua ntawm vaajntxwv xubndlag hawm hab has tas, “Vaajntxwv, ua tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv tsaug, nwg tub paab koj yeej cov tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua koj lawm!”

Vaajntxwv nug has tas, “Tug tub hluas Axaloos puas noj qaab nyob zoo?” Ahima-as teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv, thaus koj tug thawj tubrog Yau-am tso kuv lug, kuv pum suavdlawg ntxhuv sab kawg le, tabsis kuv tsi muaj cuabkaav qha rua koj paub has tas yog muaj xwm dlaabtsi.”
Vaajntxwv has tas, “Koj lug ntawm nuav.” Ces nwg txawm txaav zog moog sawv ntawd.
Tug tubqhe kws yog tuabneeg Sudaas lug txug hab has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Vaajntxwv, kuv muaj xuv zoo qha rua koj! Nub nua tug TSWV tub paab koj yeej cov tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua koj lawm!”

Vaajntxwv nug has tas, “Tug tub hluas Axaloos puas noj qaab nyob zoo hab?” Tug tubqhe teb has tas, “Kuv thov kuas tej xwmtxheej kws raug nwg ntawm poob moog raug koj cov yeebncuab ib yaam nkaus, hab raug txhua tug kws ntxeev sab rua koj.”

Vaajntxwv tu sab kawg le. Nwg txhaj nce moog rua huv chaav kws nyob sau lub roojvaag hab moog quaj sau. Thaus nwg taabtom nce moog, nwg quaj has tas, “Kuv tug mivtub! Kuv tug tub Axaloos! Axaloos kuv tug mivtub! Yog hloov tau ca kuv tuag hloov koj chaw, Axaloos kuv tug mivtub! Kuv tug tub!”
Muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Yau-am has tas, “Vaajntxwv Daviv quaj nyav hab nyuaj sab heev rua Axaloos.”
Yog le nub ntawd, Daviv cov tubrog txujkev zoo sab kws tua yeej rog txhaj hloov lug ua txujkev nyuaj sab, rua qhov puab nov has tas vaajntxwv quaj nyav nwg tug tub heev.
Puab txhaj le rov mluag mlob lug rua huv nroog, ib yaam le tej tubrog kws swb rog txaajmuag ntsuav dlha huv tshaav rog rov qaab lug.
Vaajntxwv muab ntaub lug npug nwg lub ntsejmuag hab tsaa suab hlo quaj has tas, “Kuv tug mivtub, kuv tug tub Axaloos! Axaloos kuv tug mivtub!”

Yau-am txhaj moog rua tom vaajntxwv tsev hab has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Nub nua koj rhuav koj cov tuabneeg ntsejmuag. Cov tuabneeg ntawd tub yog cov kws cawm koj hab koj cov tub, cov ntxhais, cov quaspuj hab koj cov nam yau txujsa dlim ntawm txujkev puamtsuaj.

Koj ntxub cov kws hlub koj hab nyam cov kws ntxub koj. Ua le koj ua nuav yeej qha has tas, koj tej numtswv hab koj cov tuabneeg tsi muaj txaj ntsig dlaabtsi rua koj le. Kuv paub has tas nub nua yog Axaloos muaj sa nyob hab peb tuag taag, mas koj yuav zoo sab heev.

Nwgnuav koj ca le moog has ib lu lug nplig koj cov tuabneeg sab. Kuv thov tuav tug TSWV lub npe coglug has tas, yog koj tsi moog, pigkig sawv ntxuv, puab yuav tsi muaj ib tug nrug koj nyob le lawm. Qhov ntawd yuav ua rua koj tau kev txomnyem sab nyaav dlua tej kws koj muaj thaus koj hluas lug txug naj nub nua.”

Ces vaajntxwv txhaj sawv tseeg hab moog nyob ze rua ntawm lub roojvaag nroog. Nwg cov tuabneeg nov has tas nwg tuaj nyob rua ntawd, puab txhaj lug sawv puagncig nwg. Dlhau ntawd cov Yixalayees nyag txawm rov moog nyag tsev taag lawm.

Cov pejxeem nyob thoob plawg tebchaws sis caav ntsoog qeeg, ib leeg has rua ib leeg has tas, “Tub yog Vaajntxwv Daviv cawm peb dlim ntawm peb cov yeebncuab, nwg paab kuas peb dlim ntawm cov Filitees, tabsis nwgnuav nwg tsiv Axaloos hab tawm huv lub tebchaws nuav moog lawm.
Peb tau muab roj laub rua Axaloos taubhau tsaa nwg ua peb tug vaajntxwv, tabsis nwg raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog lawm. Txawm yuav tsi muaj leejtwg moog coj Vaajntxwv Daviv rov qaab lug le los?”

Tej lug kws cov Yixalayees has nuav nrov nchaa moog txug rua Vaajntxwv Daviv.  Nwg txhaj khaiv Xadaus hab Anpiyathas kws yog ob tug povthawj moog nug cov Yudas tej thawjcoj has tas, “Vim le caag mej txhaj yog cov kws tuaj tog vaajntxwv rov qaab lug rua huv nwg lub loog lig dlua lwm paab huv tuabsi?
Mej tub yog kuv cov kwvtij, yog kuv roj kuv ntshaav ntaag. Vim le caag mej yog cov kws tuaj tog kuv lig dlua luas tej huv tuabsi?”

Hab Daviv tseem kuas obtug moog has rua Amaxas has tas, “Koj yog kuv ib tug kwvtij. Txij nub nua moog kuv yuav tsaa koj ua tug thawj saib cov tubrog hloov Yau-am chaw. Yog kuv tsi ua lawv le kuv has, thov Vaajtswv tua kuv povtseg!”
Daviv tej lug txhaj ua rua cov Yudas muab sab npuab Daviv. Puab txhaj tso tuabneeg moog has rua Daviv hab nwg cov numtswv kuas rov qaab lug.
Thaus vaajntxwv Daviv rov lug, nwg ntsib ib cov Yudas taabtom tuaj txug ntawm tug dlej Yauladees, puab yog cov kws nyob huv lub nroog Nkilenkas puab tuaj coj nwg hlaa dlej.
Tuab lub sijhawm ntawd, Nkelas tug tub Sime-is kws yog xeem Npeenyamees maaj nrooj huv lub nroog Npahulees tuaj cuag Vaajntxwv Daviv nraag tug dlej Yauladees.

Nwg coj cov Npeenyamees ib txheeb leej txivneej nrug nwg tuaj. Hab Xinpas kws yog Xa-ules tsev tuabneeg tug tubkhai coj nwg kaum tsib tug tub hab neeg nkaum leej tubkhai tuaj hab, puab tuaj txug rua ntawm tug dlej Yauladees ua ntej vaajntxwv lug txug ntawd.

Puab hlaa  dlej moog rua saab tid, tog coj vaajntxwv tsev tuabneeg hlaa dlej hab ua txhua yaam kws vaajntxwv kuas puab ua. Thaus vaajntxwv taabtom sawv kev yuav hlaa dlej, Sime-is txawm txhus caug ndlua hawm vaajntxwv

hab has tas, “Vaajntxwv, thov koj zaam txim rua tej kws kuv tau ua txhum rua koj, thaus koj tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj. Thov tsi xob muab zaaj ntawd lug tawmtsaam kuv lossis thov koj tsi xob xaav txug zaaj ntawd le.
Vaajntxwv, kuv yeej paub has tas, kuv tau ua txhum lawm tag, vim le nuav cov xeem kws nyob peg qaumteb, kuv txhaj yog thawj tug kws xub tuaj ntsib koj nub nua ntaag.”
Xeluyas tug tub Anpisais teb has tas, “Yeej tsimnyog muab Sime-is tua povtseg, rua qhov nwg tsawm foom tug kws tug TSWV xaiv ca ua vaajntxwv lawm.”

Tabsis Daviv has rua Anpisais hab Anpisais tug tijlaug Yau-am has tas, “Leejtwg thov tswvyim ntawm meb? Meb tsim teebmeem rua kuv los? Nwgnuav kuv yeej yog cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv hab nub nua kuv yuav tsi muab cov Yixalayees ib tug twg tua povtseg le.”
Hab Daviv has rua Sime-is has tas, “Kuv coglug rua koj, koj yuav tsi raug tua povtseg le.”

Mefinpauses kws yog Xa-ules tug xeebntxwv tuaj cuag vaajntxwv. Nwg yeej tsi ntxuav nwg ob txhais kutaw, tsi chais nwg cov fwjtxwv lossis ntxhua nwg tej rig tsho txij thaus vaajntxwv tsiv huv Yeluxalees moog txug nub kws vaajntxwv rov yeej lub tebchaws le.
Thaus Mefinpauses tuaj  peg Yeluxalees tuaj cuag vaajntxwv, vaajntxwv has rua Mefinpauses has tas, “Mefinpauses, vim le caag koj txhaj tsi nrug kuv moog?”

Mefinpauses teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv koj yeej paub has tas, kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg saav ceg. Kuv tub has rua kuv tug tubkhai kuas nwg muab eeb pem rua kuv tug neeg luav, rua kuv caij nrug koj moog, tabsis nwg ntxeev sab rua kuv lawm hab.
Nwg tuaj has tsi zoo rua koj, tabsis koj zoo nkaus le Vaajtswv tug timtswv, koj txhaj ua lawv le koj pum zoo xwb.

Taagnrho kuv txiv tsev tuabneeg yeej tsimnyog koj muab tua povtseg huv tuabsi lawm, tabsis koj pub kuv nrug koj noj koom tsum sau koj lub rooj. Vaajntxwv, kuv yeej tsi muaj cuabkaav yuav thov kuas koj hlub kuv ntxiv lawm.”
Vaajntxwv teb has tas, “Koj tsi xob has dlaabtsi ntxiv lawm. Kuv has rua koj has tas, Xinpas meb ca le moog muab Xa-ules tej qubtxeeg qubteg coj lug faib rua meb.”
Mefinpauses teb has tas, “Ca le muab rua Xinpas tuab leeg yuav xwb, qhov kws koj rov lug tsev thaajyeeb lug tub ua rua kuv zoo sab kawg le lawm.”
Npaxilais yog tuabneeg Nkile-as kws nyob huv lub nroog Launkelees, nwg tuaj paab coj vaajntxwv hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees.

Npaxilais yog ib tug tuabneeg laug heev, nwg tub muaj yim caum xyoo lawm. Npaxilais yog ib tug tuabneeg npluanuj hab tau xaa zaub mov tuaj pub rua vaajntxwv, thaus kws vaajntxwv tseem nyob huv Mahana-ees.
Vaajntxwv has rua Npaxilais has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuv yuav ua tug saib koj moog le.”
Tabsis Npaxilais teb has tas, “Kuv yuav nyob tsi ntev lawm, kuv yuav ua le caag nrug koj moog nyob tau huv lub nroog Yeluxalees?

Kuv tub muaj yim caum xyoo lawm, hab tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi yuav ua rua kuv zoo ntxiv lawm. Kuv noj mov hab haus dlej los kuv tub tsi nov qaab, txawm yog luas tej suab hu nkauj los kuv tub tsi nov. Ntshai kuv tsuas muaj yuav ua kev nyuaj sab rua vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv lawm xwb.
Tsi tsimnyog kuv moog txais yuav tej nqe zug kws tseemceeb ntawd le. Ca kuv nrug koj moog kuas dlhau tug dlej Yauladees rua saab tid xwb.

Ca kuv rov qaab moog tsev hab moog tuag ze kuv nam kuv txiv tej toj ntxaas. Vaajntxwv, ntawm nuav yog kuv tug tub Khihas, nwg yuav yog tug tu koj. ca le coj nwg nrug koj moog hab koj xaav paab nwg le caag los koj ca le paab nwg lawv le koj pum zoo.”
Vaajntxwv teb has tas, “Kuv yuav coj nwg nrug kuv moog hab kuv yuav paab nwg txhua yaam lawv le koj xaav kuas kuv paab. Hab kuv yuav paab koj txhua yaam kws koj thov kuv paab.”
Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg txawm hlaa tug dlej Yauladees lug lawm. Daviv txhaj nwj Npaxilais hab foom koob moov rua Npaxilais, ces nwg txawm rov moog tsev lawm.
Thaus vaajntxwv hlaa dlej, mas yog cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees ib nraab tuaj paab coj nwg hlaa. Vaajntxwv moog rua huv lub nroog Nkilenkas hab lub nroog Khihas los puab puavleej nrug nwg moog hab.

Ces cov Yixalayees txawm moog cuag vaajntxwv hab has rua nwg tas, “Vaajntxwv, vim le caag peb cov kwvtij kws yog cov Yudas, puab xaav has tas, puab txhaj yog cov kws tsimnyog tuaj tog koj hab paab xaa koj, koj tsev tuabneeg hab koj cov tuabneeg hlaa tug dlej Yauladees xwb?”

Cov Yudas teb has tas, “Peb ua le ntawd, rua qhov vaajntxwv yog peb tuab xeem. Vim le caag qhov nyuas nuav tseem yuav ua rua mej chim hab? Nwg yeej tsi muab zaub mov lug them lossis nwg yeej tsi tau muab ib yaam dlaabtsi rua peb le los sas!”

Cov Yixalayees teb has tas, “Txawm yog Vaajntxwv Daviv yog mej tuab xeem los peb yeej muaj tug nyob huv nwg ntau tshaaj mej kaum npaug! Vim le caag mej yuav saib peb tsi muaj nqes le? Mej puas ncu has tas, peb yog thawj cov kws xub has kuas moog tog vaajntxwv rov qaab lug!?” Tabsis cov Yudas tseem hajyam ntxeev lug luj tshaaj cov Yixalayees hab.

Muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Senpas, nyob huv lub nroog Nkilenkas, nwg yog Npikelis tug tub kws yog xeem Npeenyamees. Nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg sab phem heev. Nwg tshuab raaj tshuab xyu hab hu has tas, “Cov Yixalayees, peb tub tsi muaj feem nrug Daviv, peb tsi xob nrug nwg moog!”

Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj tso Daviv tseg hab nrug Senpas moog lawm, tabsis cov Yudas tseem muab sab npuab Daviv hab lawv nwg qaab tom tug dlej Yauladees lug txug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Thaus Daviv lug txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, nwg muab nwg kaum tug nam yau kws nwg tso tseg tu lub loog, cais hlo rua ib lub tsev hab tso cov faajxwm zuv. Nwg muab txhua yaam kws puab xaav tau xaa moog rua puab, tabsis nwg tsi moog nrug puab pw le lawm. Nwg tu ib qhov chaw rua puab nyob ib yaam le tej puj ntsuag moog taag puab simneej le.
Vaajntxwv has rua Amaxas has tas, “Koj ca le moog hu cov Yudas tuaj ua ke hab pigkig koj yuavtsum nrug puab tuaj rua ntawm nuav.”
Amaxas moog hu puab, tabsis nwg tsi rov tuaj lawv le lub sijhawm kws vaajntxwv teem kuas nwg tuaj.

Yog le ntawd, vaajntxwv txhaj has rua Anpisais has tas, “Npikelis tug tub Senpas tseem yuav ua phem rua peb heev tshaaj Axaloos ua hab. Koj ca le coj kuv cov tuabneeg moog lawv nwg qaab, tej zag nwg yuav nyob huv tej nroog kws txhim ntsaa yeej khov kho, kuas nwg tau chaw tsiv nkaum peb.”
Yog le ntawd, Yau-am cov tuabneeg, cov tubrog hab taagnrho cov tubrog kws seem huv Yeluxalees txhaj nrug Anpisais moog caum Npikelis tug tub Senpas.

Thaus puab moog txug ntawm lub pobzeb luj huv Nkinpe-oos, Amaxas moog ntsib puab ntawd. Yau-am yeej naav rawv cev rig tsho sis tua nrug ib raab ntaaj ntxig rua huv naab hab muab hlaab paav khov kho rua ntawm dluav. Ces thaus Yau-am naam zog moog raab ntaaj txawm hlauv hlo.
Yau-am has rua Amaxas has tas, “Kuv tug phoojywg, koj puas noj qaab nyob zoo?” Ces nwg cev loo nwg saab teg xis moog tuav nkaus Amaxas cov fwjtxwv le yuav nwj Amaxas.

Amaxas tsi ceevfaaj kws yuav muab ib yaam dlaabtsi lug thaiv kuas tau raab ntaaj, ces Yau-am txhaj tuab nkaug Amaxas plaab tshaab plawg ua nyuv tshau lug rua huv aav. Amaxas tuag kag taamsim ntawd, hab Yau-am yeej tsi tau loos ntxiv le lawm. Yau-am hab nwg tug kwv Anpisais rau sab ntso moog caum Senpas qaab.
Yau-am cov tuabneeg ib tug sawv ib saab ntawm Amaxas lub cev tuag hu has tas, “Txhua tug kws tuaj Yau-am hab Daviv tog ca le lawv Yau-am qaab!”

Amaxas tuag xyaab leeg hab tsau ntshaav tsawv huv plawv kev. Yau-am ib tug tubrog pum has tas, txhua tug puavleej lug sawv taag ua ib pawg rua ntawd lawm, nwg txhaj muab lub cev tuag hai tawm huv plawv kev moog tso rua tom haav puamkhaab hab muab ib dlaim choj npug rua.
Ces tom qaab kws muab tug tuag ntawd tshem tawm huv plawv kev lawm, puab txhua tug txhaj lawv Yau-am qaab moog caum Senpas.
Senpas moog dlhau plawg cov Yixalayees tug nrimteb moog rua huv lub nroog Anpees Npethees Ma-akas, hab taagnrho Npikelis  cov kwvtij puavleej sau nthwv tuaj nrug nwg moog rua huv lub nroog.

Yau-am cov tuabneeg nov has tas, Senpas nyob huv nroog, yog le ntawd puab txhaj moog vij lub nroog ntawd. Puab muab aav lug meem saab ntsaa yeej nrau hab khawb huv taw ntsaa yeej kuas tug ntsaa yeej qaug.
Muaj ib tug quaspuj ntse heev nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, nwg qw huv lub nroog tuaj has tas, “Mej ca le noog! Mej ca le noog kuv has! Has rua Yau-am kuas ca le lug ntawm nuav; kuv xaav nrug nwg thaam!”

Yau-am txawm txaav zog moog ze tug quaspuj ntawd, tug quaspuj ntawd nug has tas, “Koj yog Yau-am los?” Yau-am teb has tas, “Kuv yog Yau-am ntaag.” Tug quaspuj ntawd has tas, “Koj ca le noog kuv has.” Yau-am teb has tas, “Kuv yeej noog koj has.”
Tug quaspuj ntawd txawm has tas, “Luas ibtxwm has tas, ‘Ca le moog nrhav tej lug teb ntawm Anpees,’ puab ua le ntawd txhaj sis has hum lawm.

Peb muaj kev thaajyeeb hab kev ncaaj nceeg nyob huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees nuav. Vim le caag koj pheej nrhav kev muab lub nroog kws yog leej nam huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees nuav rhuav povtseg? Puas yog koj xaav nqog tej kws yog tug TSWV tug?”
Yau-am teb has tas, “Kuv tsi ua kuas puamtsuaj ib zag le. Kuv tsi laam rhuav tshem lossis ua kuas peb lub nroog nuav puamtsuaj!

Tsi yog peb txhobtxwm ua le ntawd. tabsis muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Senpas kws yog Npikelis tug tub. Nwg ntxeev sab rua Vaajntxwv Daviv hab tsiv peg lub nroog Efalayees tuaj rua huv nuav lawm. Yog mej muab tau tug tuabneeg nuav cob rua peb, kuv yuav tso lub nroog nuav tseg.” Tug quaspuj ntawd has tas, “Peb yuav muab nwg lub taubhau pov tuaj rua mej.”

Ces tug quaspuj ntawd txhaj moog cuag cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog lawv le nwg npaaj sab lawm, puab txhaj muab Senpas lub taubhau txav pov tuaj rua Yau-am saab ntsaa yeej nrau. Yau-am txhaj tshuab raaj tshuab xyu kuas nwg cov tuabneeg tso lub nroog ntawd tseg, puab txhaj rov lug tsev lawm. Yau-am rov lug cuag vaajntxwv rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Yau-am yog cov Yixalayees tug thawj tubrog; Yehauyadas tug tub Npenayas yog tug saib cov tubrog kws zuv Daviv;
Adaunilaas yog tug saib cov ua num; Ahilus tug tub Yehausafas yog tug saib cov tuav ntaub ntawv;
Sevas yog tug teev ntawv, Xadaus hab Anpiyathas yog ob tug povthawj,
hab Ilas kws nyob huv lub nroog Ya-ilas yog Daviv tug povthawj hab.

Lub sijhawm kws Daviv ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws muaj kev tshaib plaab tau peb xyoos txwm nkaus. Yog le ntawd, Daviv txhaj moog nug tug TSWV txug zaaj ntawd, tug TSWV has tas, “Tub yog Xa-ules hab nwg tsev tuabneeg ua txhum, vim puab tua tuabneeg; nwg muab cov tuabneeg huv Nkinpe-oos tua tuag taag.”

(Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Nkinpe-oos tsi yog tuabneeg Yixalayees; puab yog cov tuabneeg Amaules ib paab nyuas tsawg heev kws cov Yixalayees tau coglug rua puab has tas, yuav tsomkwm puab, tabsis Xa-ules moog muab puab tua tuag taag lawm, rua qhov Xa-ules mob sab heev rua cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas.)

Yog le ntawd, Daviv caw cov Nkinpe-oos tuaj cuag nwg hab has rua puab tas, “Mej xaav kuas kuv ua dlaabtsi paab mej? Kuv yuav ua le caag txhaj le pauj tau tej kws luas ua rua mej taag lug lawm, mej txhaj yuav foom koob moov rua tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg.”

Puab teb has tas, “Peb tau nrug Xa-ules hab nwg tsev tuabneeg sis tshe txaus lawm, txawm yog yuav muab nyaj muab kub lug khu peb hab muab cov Yixalayees ib tug twg tua pauj los peb yeej tsi txaus sab le.” Daviv txhaj nug has tas, “Yog le ntawd, mej xaav kuas kuv ua dlaabtsi paab mej?”
Puab teb has tas, “Xa-ules yeej xaav muab peb tua kuas tu noob nrho, tsi xaav kuas peb ib tug seem nyob huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees nuav le.

Yog le ntawd, yuavtsum muab nwg xyaa tug tub xeebntxwv cob rua peb, hab peb yuav muab puab dlai taabmeeg tug TSWV rua huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as kws yog Xa-ules lub nroog kws tug TSWV tau xaiv nwg ua vaajntxwv.” Vaajntxwv teb has tas, “Kuv yuav muab puab cob rua mej teg.”
Tabsis vim Daviv hab Yaunathaas tau coglug khov heev rua tug TSWV lawm, Daviv txhaj tseg Yaunathaas tug tub Mefinpauses kws yog Xa-ules tug xeebntxwv ca.

Txawm le ntawd los Daviv tseem moog nteg Amaunis hab Mefinpauses kws yog A-iyas tug ntxhais Lixenpas ob tug tub kws nwg yug rua Xa-ules hab Daviv moog nteg Xa-ules tug ntxhais Melas tsib tug tub kws Melas yug rua Npaxilais tug tub Adeyees huv Mehulas coj lug rua puab huv tuabsi.

Hab Daviv muab puab cob rua cov Nkinpe-oos. Cov Nkinpe-oos txhaj coj puab moog dlai taabmeeg tug TSWV, ces xyaa leej ntawd txhaj tuag ua ke huv tuabsi lawm. Puab raug tua tuag rua thaus lub caij ntuj naag tu kws taabtom pib hlais nplej.

Xa-ules tug nam yau Lixenpas kws yog A-iyas tug ntxhais, txhaj muab ntaub tsaaj coj moog ua ib lub tsev pheebsuab rua nwg nyob sau lub pobzeb kws puab tso cov tuag, hab nwg nyob huv lub tsev ntawd thaus pib hlais nplej moog txug thaus lub caij ntuj naag nqeg. Thaus Daviv nov tej kws Lixepas ua ntawd,

Daviv txhaj moog muab Xa-ules hab Xa-ules tug tub Yaunathaas cov pobtxhaa ntawm cov Yanpes huv Nkile-as lug. (Puab moog nyag tej pobtxhaa ntawd huv lub plawv nroog Npes Saas, ntawm qhov chaw kws cov Filitees muab Xa-ules hab Yaunathaas dlai nub kws puab tua Xa-ules tuag rua sau lub Roob Nkinpau-as ntaag.)
Daviv khaws Xa-ules, Yaunathaas hab xyaa tug txivneej kws luas muab dlai nrug obtug ua ke ntawm cov pobtxhaa huv tuabsi lug.

Ces puab txhaj muab Xa-ules hab Yaunathaas obtug cov pobtxhaa coj moog log rua huv Xa-ules txiv Kises lub qhov ntxaa ntawm lub nroog Xelas huv xeev Npeenyamees. Puab ua txhua yaam lawv le vaajntxwv has kuas puab ua. Tom qaab ntawm Vaajtswv txhaj teb tej lug kws puab thov paab puab lub tebchaws.
Cov Filitees hab cov Yixalayees rov ua rog dlua, ces Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhaj moog tua cov Filitees. Thaus puab taabtom sis tua ntawd Daviv tsaug muas heev.
Muaj ib tug txivneej luj heev hu ua Inpinpenaus nqaa ib raab muv tooj nyaav xyaa choj hab rau laag hab nwg ris ib raab ntaaj tshab. Nwg xaav has tas, nwg yuav tua kuas tau Daviv povtseg.

Tabsis Xeluyas tug tub Anpisais txaav zog lug paab Daviv ntaus tug tuabneeg luj heev ntawd hab muab tua tuag kag lawm. Daviv cov tubrog coglug rua Daviv kuas nwg tsi xob nrug puab moog tua rog ntxiv lawm. Puab has tas, “Peb cov Yixalayees ca sab rua koj xwb, peb tsi xaav ca cov Yixalayees lub teeb tuag.”
Tom qaab nuav rov muaj kev sis tua nrug cov Filitees huv lub nroog Nkaunpes dlua, thaus ntawd Xinpekas kws nyob huv Husas txhaj tua ib tug tuabneeg luj heev kws hu ua Xelas tuag lawm hab.

Rov muaj kev sis tua nrug cov Filitees ntxiv huv lub nroog Nkaunpes. Yais  tug tub Ehanas kws nyob huv lub nroog Npelehees txhaj tua Nkauli-am kws nyob huv lub nroog Nkas tuag. Nkauli-am muaj ib raab muv, tug vug tuab ib yaam le lub nqog ntus ntaub.
Tseem rov muaj kev sis tua nyob huv lub nroog Nkas. Nyob huv muaj ib tug txivneej luj sab hab nwg nyam sis tua heev. Nwg ib saab teg muaj rau tug ntivteg hab ib saab kutaw muaj rau tug ntivtaw.
Nwg tsawm foom cov Yixalayees, ces Yaunathaas kws yog Daviv tijlaug tug tub Samas muab tug txivneej ntawd tua tuag kag.
Plaub tug txivneej nuav yog cov tuabneeg luj sab heev, puab yeej yog cov tuabneeg kws yug nyob huv lub nroog Nkas. Puab raug Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg muab tua tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Thaus tug TSWV cawm Daviv dlim ntawm Xa-ules hab Daviv cov yeebncuab lug, Daviv hu zaaj nkauj nuav ua tug TSWV tsaug:
Tug TSWV yog tug kws tsomkwm kuv; nwg yog kuv lub chaw nkaum kws ruaj khov.

Kuv tug Vaajtswv yog tug tsomkwm kuv, hab tub yog muaj nwg kuv txhaj tau nyob kaaj sab lug. Nwg tiv thaiv kuv ib yaam le dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj; Nwg tiv thaiv kuv hab muab kuv tso rua qhov chaw thaajyeeb lug. Nwg yog kuv tug Cawmseej, nwg tsomkwm kuv hab paab kuv dlim txujkev puamtsuaj.
Tsimnyog kuv qhuas tug TSWV, kuv tsaa suab hlo thov tug TSWV hab nwg cawm kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab.
Kev tuag nphau nphwv nyob puagncig kuv; Txujkev puamtsuaj npau phwj yog tuaj qhwv nkaus kuv.
Txujkev tuag kws txaus ntshai nyob puagncig kuv, hab lub qhov ntxaa cuab lug thaiv kuv kev tsi pub kuv dlhau.
Thaus kuv ntsib kev nyuaj sab ntxhuv plawv kuv hu kuv tug TSWV xwb; kuv hu kuv tug Vaajtswv paab kuv. Huv nwg lub tuamtsev nwg nov kuv tej lug thov; Nwg noog kuv lub suab quaj thov nwg paab.
Ces lub nplajteb txawm qeeg hab ua zug koog; ncej ntug quaj qeeg nkawg nyob tsi tswm, rua qhov Vaajtswv chim heev!
Paa nchu auv nab huv nwg qhovntswg tuaj, nplaim tawg hab ncaig tawg cig laam lug huv nwg qhovncauj.
Nwg muab lub ntuj dlua qheb hlo hab nqeg plhuav nrug cov fuab tsaus dlub ncab huv nwg qaab xibtaws lug.
Nwg caij tug qhelus yaa ceev heev, pum nwg nyob rawv sau ob phob tis cua.
Nwg ua qhov tsaus ntuj thaiv nwg; tauv fuab tuab kws muaj naag nyob puagncig nwg;
Muaj xub laim ua txaim tawg cig lab vog ntawm nwg xubndlag.
Tug TSWV ua xub nroo qeeg nkawg sau ntuj tuaj, hab nov Vaajtswv tug muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lub suab.
Nwg tua nwg xibxub neevnti tuaj, hab nwg cov yeebncuab tsiv ri sua; nwg ua kuas muaj tsaglig xub laim lab vog muab puab lawv tawm tsiv.
Qaab thu dlej havtxwv pum kev laam lug hab tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi thaiv tau tej ncej txheem nplajteb, thaus tug TSWV npautawg, nwg tshev nwg cov yeebncuab nyooj lawg.
Tug TSWV cev teg sau tuaj tuav kuv; nwg npu kuv tawm huv dlej qhov kws tub tshaaj plawg lug.
Nwg cawm kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab lub fwjchim, dlim ntawm cov kws ntxub kuv, hab cov kws muaj zug dlua kuv.
Luas tuaj tawmtsaam kuv thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem, tabsis tug TSWV tsomkwm kuv.
Nwg coj kuv lug nyob rua ntawm qhov chaw dlaav; nwg cawm kuv, rua qhov nwg txaus sab rua kuv.
Tug TSWV muab nqe zug rua kuv, rua qhov kuv ua ncaaj nceeg; nwg foom koob moov rua kuv, rua qhov kuv tsi tau ua txhum.
Kuv ua lawv le tug TSWV txuj kevcai; kuv tsi tso kuv tug Vaajtswv tseg le.
Kuv ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai qha; kuv tsi tawv ncauj, kuv noog nwg tej lug saamfwm.
Nwg paub has tas kuv tsi tau ua txhum, rua qhov kuv yeej ceevfaaj nraim tsi ua yuam kev.
Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj muab nqe zug rua kuv, rua qhov kuv ua ncaaj nceeg, vim nwg paub has tas kuv tsi tau ua txhum.
Tug TSWV, koj yeej ua ncaaj nceeg rua cov tuabneeg kws muab sab npuab koj, hab ua zoo rua cov tuabneeg kws ua zoo rua koj.
Koj ua sab dlawb paug rua cov tuabneeg dlawbhuv, tabsis koj ntxub ntxaug cov tuabneeg sab phem sab nkhaus.
Koj cawm cov tuabneeg kws txu fwjchim, tabsis koj txu cov tuabneeg kws khaavtheeb lub fwjchim.
Tug TSWV, koj yog kuv lub teeb, koj ua rua kuv txujkev tsaus ntuj pum kev kaaj nrig.
Koj pub kuv muaj zug ntaus yeej kuv cov yeebncuab hab muaj peevxwm kovyeej puab tej kev tawmtsaam.
Tej kws Vaajtswv ua puavleej zoo, tug TSWV tej lug yog lug tseeb. Nwg zoo le dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj rua txhua tug kws vaamkhom nwg.
Tug TSWV tuab leeg txhaj yog Vaajtswv; Vaajtswv tuab leeg txhaj yog tug tsomkwm peb.
Tug Vaajtswv nuav yog kuv qhov chaw nraim cev kws ruaj khov, nwg ua rua  kuv txuj hauv kev kaaj nrig.
Nwg ua rua kuv ob txhais kutaw tsuj khov ib yaam le tej rau muaslwj; nwg tsomkwm kuv nyob kaaj sab lug sau tej roob.
Nwg qha kuv ntaus rog, kuv txhaj muaj peevxwm tua tau raab neevnti kws muaj zug kawg nkaus.
Tug TSWV, koj tsomkwm kuv hab cawm kuv dlim; koj txujkev paab ua rua kuv muaj fwjchim luj.
Koj tsomkwm tsi pub luas nteg tau kuv, hab kuv tsi qaug ib zag le.
Kuv caum kuv cov yeebncuab hab tua yeej puab; kuv tsi tso tseg moog txug thaus kuv ua rua puab puamtsuaj taag.
Kuv muab puab ntaus qaug taag hab puab sawv tsi taug le; puab pw nrum sav nroog ntawm kuv kutaw.
Koj txhawb kuv tug zug, kuv txhaj muaj zug sis tua huv tshaav rog; hab pub kuv yeej kuv cov yeebncuab.
Koj ua rua kuv cov yeebncuab tsiv tawm ntawm kuv hauv ntej moog; kuv ua rua txhua tug kws ntxub kuv raug puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.
Puab nrhav kev paab, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg paab puab; puab thov tug TSWV, tabsis nwg tsi teb puab.
Kuv muab puab tsoo tawg mog nyoos ib yaam le tej moov aav; kuv tsuj puab ib yaam le tsuj tej aav nkus huv plawv kev.
Koj cawm kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua kuv, hab koj ca kuv ua tug kaav ntau tsaav tuabneeg; tej tsaav tuabneeg kws kuv tsi tau paub dlua los nwgnuav tub lug zwm rua kuv lawm.
Tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws los tuaj qhau hau hawm kuv huv tuabsi; thaus puab nov kuv has, puab yeej fwm hab noog kuv tej lug.
Puab qaug zug hab tawm tej tug tshee naa  huv puab tej chaw nyob tuaj.
Tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob, ua tsaug kws koj yog tug tsomkwm kuv; ca le pav Vaajtswv tug kws cawm kuv lub koob kuas nrov nchaa moo lug!
Nwg paab kuv tua yeej kuv cov yeebncuab, nwg muab ntau tsaav tuabneeg rua kuv kaav
hab cawm kuv dlim ntawm kuv cov yeebncuab. Tug TSWV, koj paab kuv tua yeej kuv cov yeebncuab lawm tag; hab paab kuv dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg limham kws tuaj txuv kuv.
Yog le ntawd, kuv ua koj tsaug taabmeeg txhua tsaav tuabneeg; kuv hu nkauj qhuas koj tuab leeg xwb.
Vaajtswv paab nwg tug vaajntxwv muaj yeej luj kawg nkaus le; nwg yeej hlub tug kws nwg xaiv tseg lawm; nwg hlub Daviv hab Daviv cov xeebntxwv moog ibtxhis le.

Yexais tug tub Daviv yog tug tuabneeg kws Vaajtswv tsaa ua tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, nwg yog tug kws Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv xaiv lug ua vaajntxwv, hab nwg yog tug kws sau cov nkauj kws zoo tshaaj plawg rua cov Yixalayees hu. Tej lug nuav yog Daviv cov lug has thaus kawg:
Tug TSWV tug ntsujplig has rua kuv; nwg tej lug nyob ntawm kuv tug nplaig;
Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tau has tseg lawm; Tug kws tsomkwm cov Yixalayees has le nuav rua kuv, “Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav ncaaj nceeg, hab kaav lug ntawm txujkev fwm Vaajtswv,
nwg zoo ib yaam le lub nub ci thaus sawv ntxuv kws tsi muaj fuab le, yog lub nub kws ua rua tej nroj tsuag ntsais tsa thaus lug naag taag.”

Vaajtswv yuav foom koob moov ntau npaug rua kuv cov xeebntxwv, rua qhov nwg tau coglug ruaj khov rua kuv moog ibtxhis; hab lu lug cog tseg ntawd yuav tsi muab rhuav ib zag le, yog lu lug cog tseg kws tsi txawj hloov. Tej ntawd yog tej kws kuv xaav tau; qhov ntawd yuav yog kuv txujkev muaj yeej, hab Vaajtswv yuav muab tej ntawd rua kuv lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws tsi fwm Vaajtswv, puab zoo ib yaam le tej xuavpaug kws muab sau povtseg; tsi muaj tuabneeg xaav muab teg kov le lawm.
Mej yuavtsum muab cuabyeej hlau lossis muv hlau moog sua lawm xwb; puab yuav raug hlawv kub nyab kuas taag dlu lug.

Cov tuabneeg nuav yog Daviv cov tubrog kws nto moo tej npe: Tug ib yog Yauses Npasenpes kws nyob huv lub nroog Takhemoos ua tug thawj ntawm “Peb Leeg”  Nwg muab nwg tug muv  nrug yim pua leej txivneej sis nkaug hab nwg muab puab nkaug tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog.

Tug ob kws nto moo ntawm peb leeg yog Daudaus tug tub Ele-axas kws yog cuab Ahaus. Muaj ib nub nwg hab Daviv twv nrug cov Filitees kws taabtom tuaj txoos ua ke rua ntawm tshaav rog. Cov Yixalayees swb thim rov qaab,

tabsis Ele-axas sawv nreg nroog tua cov Filitees moog txug thaus nwg tsaug npaab hab tsaa tsi taug nwg raab ntaaj lawm. Nub ntawd tug TSWV muaj yeej luj kawg le. Tom qaab kws tej ntawd dlhau lawm, cov Yixalayees maam le rov lug rua huv qhov chaw kws Ele-axas nyob hab lug hle cov tuabneeg kws Ele-axas tua tuag tej rig tsho hlau.

Tug peb kws nto moo ntawm peb leeg ntawd yog Akhees tug tub Samas kws nyob huv lub nroog Halas. Cov Filitees tuaj txoos ua ke rua ntawm Lehis kws yog ib thaaj teb taum mog. Cov Yixalayees tsiv cov Filitees,
tabsis Samas sawv nreg nroog ntawm nwg lub chaw huv thaaj teb ntawd tiv tua cov Filitees. Nub ntawd tug TSWV muaj yeej luj kawg le.

Thaus yuav txug lub caij pib sau qoobloo,  peb leeg ntawm “Peb Caug Leej” ntawd, txawm nqeg moog rua nraag lub qhov tsua Adulas, qhov chaw kws Daviv nyob. Thaus ntawd cov Filitees taabtom tuaj tsuam yeej rua huv lub Haav Lefayees.
Lub sijhawm ntawd Daviv moog nyob sau roob hab muaj ib paab tubrog Filitees kaav hlo lub nroog Npelehees.
Daviv ncu tsev heev, nwg txhaj seev has tas, “Yuav ua le caag kuv txhaj khaiv tau ib tug moog cug cov dlej huv lub qhov tshij kws nyob ntawm roojvaag nroog Npelehees lug rua kuv haus!”

Ces peb tug tubrog kws nto moo ntawd txhaj le dlha ceev heev moog phua plhawv cov Filitees lub yeej moog cug cov dlej huv lub qhov tshij kws nyob ntawm lub roojvaag nroog Npelehees, hab nqaa lug rua Daviv. Tabsis Daviv tsi kaam haus cov dlej ntawd, nwg muab laub fij rua tug TSWV,

Daviv has tas, “Thov kuv tug Vaajtswv txwv tsi xob pub kuv haus cov dlej nuav! Puas tsimnyog kuv haus cov ntshaav kws yog cov tuabneeg nuav txujsa? Vim puab muab puab txujsa moog pauv txhaj nqaa tau cov dlej nuav lug.” Nwg txhaj tsi kaam haus cov dlej ntawd. Tej nuav yog peb tug tubrog kws sab tawv ntawd moog nqaa tau lug.

Anpisais kws yog Yau-am tug kwv, (Obtug nam hu ua Xeluyas) ua tug thawj ntawm “Peb caug leej kws Nto Moo ntawd.” Nwg siv nwg raab ntaaj tua peb puas leej txivneej hab muab puab tua tuag taag huv tuabsi. Nwg txhaj yog tug kws nto moo ntawm “Peb Caug Leej”  ntawd.
Nwg yog tug kws nto moo tshaaj ntawm “Peb Caug Leej”  ntawd hab nwg tau ua puab tug thawjcoj, tabsis nwg tseem nto moo tsi npaum le “Peb Leeg” ntawd hab.

Yehauyadas tug tub Npenayas kws nyob huv lub nroog Kaxees tuaj, nwg yog ib tug kws nto moo heev hab. Nwg muaj sab tawv ua tau ntau yaam zoo. Nwg tua ob tug tubrog Mau-am kws ua tau kawg nkaus tuag huv tuabsi lawm. Muaj ib nub kws lug dlaus hlub heev los nwg tseem nqeg moog tua tau ib tug tsuv ntxhuav huv qhov aav lug hab.

Hab nwg tseem tua ib tug tubrog Iziv kws luj heev tuag. Tug tuabneeg Iziv ntawd nqaa ib raab muv, tabsis Npenayas muab qws ntaus tug tuabneeg Iziv ntawd hab txeeb tau nwg raab muv ntawm nwg teg lug, hab muab tug tubrog Iziv ntawd nkaug tuag lawm.
Tej ntawd tub yog teg num kws Npenayas ua. Nwg yog ib tug ntawm “Peb caug Leej.”  ntawd.
Nwg yog ib tug kws nto moo heev ntawm “Peb Caug Leej”. Nwg tseem tsi nto moo npaum le “Peb Leeg” ntawd hab. Daviv txhaj tsaa nwg ua tug thawj saib cov tubrog kws zuv Daviv.

Muaj ib zag tug TSWV chim heev rua cov Yixalayees, tug TSWV txhaj tshoov Daviv sab kuas nwg ua rua puab tau kev txomnyem. Tug TSWV has rua Daviv has tas, “Koj ca le moog suav kuas taagnrho cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas saib muaj npaum le caag.”

Yog le ntawd, Daviv txhaj has rua Yau-am kws yog nwg tug thawj tubrog has tas, “Koj ca le coj koj cov numtswv nrug koj moog txheeb cov pejxeem Yixalayees txhua xeem npe thoob plawg huv lub tebchaws saab tom nuav moog ti nkaus saab tom u. Kuv xaav paub saib peb muaj pejxeem coob npaum le caag.”

Tabsis vaajntxwv, vim le caag koj txhaj xaav kuas ua tej nuav?”
Vaajntxwv has tawv qhawv kuas Yau-am hab nwg cov numtswv ua lawv le vaajntxwv tej lug xwb; puab txhaj tawm moog suav cov pejxeem Yixalayees lawm.

Puab moog hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees hab moog su rua ntawm lub nroog Alu-es saab nraag. Lub nroog ntawd nyob huv plawv lub haav kws yog xeem Khas cheebtsaam aav.  Puab txhaj tawm ntawm qhov chaw ntawd nce toj moog rua saab qaumteb peg Yaxes,

hab moog rua huv lub nroog Nkile-as moog rua huv lub nroog Kades kws nyob huv cov Hitis cheebtsaam aav.  Dlhau ntawd, puab moog rua huv lub nroog Daas hab puab tawm huv lub nroog Daas moog  rua saab nubpoob moog txug rua huv lub nroog Xidoos.

Ces puab moog rua saab qaabteb, moog txug rua huv lub nroog Teles kws muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv, hab puab ncig moog txhua nrho cov Hivis hab cov Kana-aas tej nroog, thaus kawg puab lug txug rua huv lub nroog Npesenpas kws nyob huv xeev Yudas saab qaabteb.

Tug TSWV has rua Nkas kws yog Daviv tug cev Vaajtswv lug tas, “Koj ca le moog qha rua Daviv has tas, kuv muab peb yaam rua nwg xaiv, kuas nwg xaiv ib yaam xwb. Nwg xaiv yaam twg, kuv yuav muab yaam ntawd rua nwg.” Taagkig kaaj ntug thaus Daviv sawv lawm,

Nkas txhaj moog ntsib Daviv hab pav tug TSWV tej lug rua Daviv noog lawv le tug TSWV has, hab nwg has tas, “Saib koj yuav xaiv yaam twg?
